ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] تَحْسَبُ [do you think] أَنَّ [that] أَكْثَرَهُمْ [most of them] يَسْمَعُونَ [hear] أَوْ [or] يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ [understand] إِنْ [Not] هُمْ [they] إِلَّا [(are) except] كَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ [like cattle] بَلْ [Nay] هُمْ [they] أَضَلُّ [(are) more astray] سَبِيلًا [(from the) way]
ayahs.transliteration: Am tahsabu anna aktharahumyasmaAAoona aw yaAAqiloona in hum illa kal-anAAamibal hum adallu sabeela

ayahs.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ ٱلظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَآءَ لَجَعَلَهُۥ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Do you not] تَرَ [see] إِلَىٰ [[to]] رَبِّكَ [your Lord] كَيْفَ [how] مَدَّ [He extends] ٱلظِّلَّ [the shadow] وَلَوْ [And if] شَآءَ [He willed] لَجَعَلَهُۥ [surely He (could) have made it] سَاكِنًۭا [stationary] ثُمَّ [Then] جَعَلْنَا [We made] ٱلشَّمْسَ [the sun] عَلَيْهِ [for it] دَلِيلًۭا [an indication]
ayahs.transliteration: Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda aththillawalaw shaa lajaAAalahu sakinan thumma jaAAalnaashshamsa AAalayhi daleela

ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] قَبَضْنَـٰهُ [We withdraw it] إِلَيْنَا [to Us] قَبْضًۭا [a withdrawal] يَسِيرًۭا [gradual]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَٱلنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] جَعَلَ [made] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلَّيْلَ [the night] لِبَاسًۭا [(as) a covering] وَٱلنَّوْمَ [and the sleep] سُبَاتًۭا [a rest] وَجَعَلَ [and made] ٱلنَّهَارَ [the day] نُشُورًۭا [a resurrection]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala lakumuallayla libasan wannawma subatan wajaAAalaannahara nushoora

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً طَهُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِىٓ [(is) the One Who] أَرْسَلَ [sends] ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ [the winds] بُشْرًۢا [(as) glad tidings] بَيْنَ [before] يَدَىْ [before] رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ [His Mercy] وَأَنزَلْنَا [and We send down] مِنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] مَآءًۭ [water] طَهُورًۭا [pure]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee arsala arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina assama-imaan tahoora

ayahs.textUthmani: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا وَأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: لِّنُحْـِۧىَ [That We may give life] بِهِۦ [thereby] بَلْدَةًۭ [(to) a land] مَّيْتًۭا [dead] وَنُسْقِيَهُۥ [and We give drink] مِمَّا [thereof] خَلَقْنَآ [(to those) We created] أَنْعَـٰمًۭا [cattle] وَأَنَاسِىَّ [and men] كَثِيرًۭا [many]
ayahs.transliteration: Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytanwanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna anAAaman waanasiyyakatheera

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] صَرَّفْنَـٰهُ [We have distributed it] بَيْنَهُمْ [among them] لِيَذَّكَّرُوا۟ [that they may remember] فَأَبَىٰٓ [but refuse] أَكْثَرُ [most] ٱلنَّاسِ [(of) the people] إِلَّا [except] كُفُورًۭا [disbelief]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahumliyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu annasiilla kufoora

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَوْ [And if] شِئْنَا [We willed] لَبَعَثْنَا [surely, We (would) have raised] فِى [in] كُلِّ [every] قَرْيَةٍۢ [town] نَّذِيرًۭا [a warner]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaw shi/na labaAAathna feekulli qaryatin natheera

ayahs.textUthmani: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَجَـٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَلَا [So (do) not] تُطِعِ [obey] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [the disbelievers] وَجَـٰهِدْهُم [and strive (against) them] بِهِۦ [with it] جِهَادًۭا [a striving] كَبِيرًۭا [great]
ayahs.transliteration: Fala tutiAAi alkafireenawajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeera

ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] مَرَجَ [(has) released] ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ [the two seas] هَـٰذَا [[this] (one)] عَذْبٌۭ [palatable] فُرَاتٌۭ [and sweet] وَهَـٰذَا [and [this] (one)] مِلْحٌ [salty] أُجَاجٌۭ [(and) bitter] وَجَعَلَ [and He has made] بَيْنَهُمَا [between them] بَرْزَخًۭا [a barrier] وَحِجْرًۭا [and a partition] مَّحْجُورًۭا [forbidden]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee maraja albahraynihatha AAathbun furatun wahatha milhunojajun wajaAAala baynahuma barzakhan wahijranmahjoora

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] خَلَقَ [has created] مِنَ [from] ٱلْمَآءِ [the water] بَشَرًۭا [human being] فَجَعَلَهُۥ [and has made (for) him] نَسَبًۭا [blood relationship] وَصِهْرًۭا ۗ [and marriage relationship] وَكَانَ [And is] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] قَدِيرًۭا [All-Powerful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina alma-ibasharan fajaAAalahu nasaban wasihran wakanarabbuka qadeera

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱلْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيَعْبُدُونَ [But they worship] مِن [besides Allah] دُونِ [besides Allah] ٱللَّهِ [besides Allah] مَا [what] لَا [not profits them] يَنفَعُهُمْ [not profits them] وَلَا [and not] يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ [harms them] وَكَانَ [and is] ٱلْكَافِرُ [the disbeliever] عَلَىٰ [against] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] ظَهِيرًۭا [a helper]
ayahs.transliteration: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi mala yanfaAAuhum wala yadurruhum wakanaalkafiru AAala rabbihi thaheera
